description.value: You gain an appropriate ki spell for your School of Perfection: @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.spells-srd.Unblinking Flame Ignition]{Unblinking Flame Ignition} for Unblinking Flame, @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.spells-srd.Unbreaking Wave Containment]{Unbreaking Wave Containment} for Unbreaking Waves, @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.spells-srd.Unfolding Wind Crash]{Unfolding Wind Crash} for Unfolding Wind, or @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.spells-srd.Untwisting Iron Pillar]{Untwisting Iron Pillar} for Untwisting Iron. Increase the number of Focus Points in your focus pool by 1. You become a master in occult spell DCs and occult spell attack rolls.

value.value: Perfect Ki Expert or Perfect Ki Exemplar
